description: Master Figma, the world's leading collaborative design tool for interface design and prototyping.

slides.title: What is Figma?
slides.content:
# Figma ðŸŽ¨

Figma is a vector graphics editor and prototyping tool which is primarily web-based.

Key features:
- **Real-time Collaboration:** Multiple people can design at once.
- **Browser-based:** Works on Mac, Windows, Linux, Chromebooks.
- **Community:** Huge library of plugins and templates.

slides.title: The Interface
slides.content:
# The Workspace ðŸ–¥ï¸

1.  **Canvas:** The infinite space where you design.
2.  **Layers Panel (Left):** Shows frames, groups, and elements.
3.  **Properties Panel (Right):** Controls styling (colors, layout, export).
4.  **Toolbar (Top):** Tools like Frame, Shape, Pen, Text.

slides.title: Frames vs Groups
slides.content:
# Frames vs Groups ðŸ–¼ï¸

**Groups:** Just bunding layers together. Scaling a group scales its contents.

**Frames:** Like a div in HTML. Can have background color, clips content, and supports Auto Layout. **Use Frames for screens.**

slides.title: Auto Layout
slides.content:
# Auto Layout ðŸ¤–

The most powerful feature in Figma.

It allows you to create dynamic frames that expand or shrink based on their content.

- Like Flexbox in CSS.
- Controls padding and transparency.
- Easy reordering of items.

slides.title: Feature Quiz
slides.quizQuestion: Which CSS concept is Figma's 'Auto Layout' most similar to?

slides.title: Components
slides.content:
# Components ðŸ§©

Reusable UI elements.

1.  **Main Component:** The original definition (Master).
2.  **Instance:** Copies of the component used in designs.

Changes to the Main Component propagate to all Instances instantly.

slides.title: Variants
slides.content:
# Variants ðŸŽ­

Group related components together.

Example: A Button Component with variants:
- **State:** Default, Hover, Disabled.
- **Type:** Primary, Secondary.
- **Size:** Small, Large.

Easily switch between them in the UI.

slides.title: Prototyping in Figma
slides.content:
# Prototyping ðŸ–±ï¸

Connect frames to create interactive flows.

- **Trigger:** On Click, On Hover, On Drag.
- **Action:** Navigate to, Open Overlay, Swap.
- **Animation:** Instant, Dissolve, Smart Animate (magic!).

slides.title: Smart Animate
slides.content:
# Smart Animate âœ¨

Figma looks for matching layers (by name and hierarchy) between two frames and animates the difference.

Create button pushes, toggles, or complex transitions smoothly without manual keyframing.

slides.title: Plugins
slides.content:
# Plugins ðŸ”Œ

Extend Figma's capabilities.

Popular plugins:
- **Unsplash:** Insert free high-quality images.
- **Iconify:** Access thousands of icons.
- **Content Reel:** Fill designs with fake data (names, avatars).
- **Contrast:** Check accessibility contrast ratios.

slides.title: Collaboration
slides.content:
# Teamwork ðŸ¤

- **Comments:** Leave feedback directly on the canvas.
- **Multiplayer:** See others' cursors in real-time.
- **Dev Mode:** Insprect designs for CSS code, spacing values, and assets (New feature).

slides.title: Summary
slides.content:
# Recap: Figma ðŸŽ“

The industry standard.

- **Frames > Groups.**
- **Auto Layout** is king.
- **Components & Variants** for design systems.
- **Prototyping** brings it to life.
- **Collaboration** is built-in.
